creditline: Gift of Frederick T. and Margaret M. Boehm
description: scene with several brown and black buildings with figure in black on R, walking away from viewer; building on L has a stone foundation and a path leading to building on R, where several logs are piled; building at center has white upper level and smaller building in front; green forest visible in background

title: Treasure Building
